----
resp = client.security.put_role_mapping(
    name="mapping4",
    roles=[
        "superuser"
    ],
    enabled=True,
    rules={
        "any": [
            {
                "field": {
                    "username": "esadmin"
                }
            },
            {
                "field": {
                    "groups": [
                        "cn=admins,dc=example,dc=com",
                        "cn=other,dc=example,dc=com"
                    ]
                }
            }
        ]
    },
)
print(resp)
